snippet: An overcrowded bus carrying young people home from a church service caught fire on Sunday in the northern city of Fundación, and at least 32 children were killed, the authorities said.
abstract: Overcrowded bus carrying young people home from church service catches fire in Fundacion, Colombia, killing at least 32 children.
lead_paragraph: An overcrowded bus carrying young people home from a church service caught fire on Sunday in the northern city of Fundación, and at least 32 children were killed, the authorities said.

headline.main: At Least 32 Children Die in Fire on Crowded Bus in Colombia
headline.print_headline: At Least 32 Children Die in Fire on Crowded Bus
